metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8646 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.324 and19.x and 20.x before 20.0.0.267 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.559on Linux, Adobe AIR before 20.0.0.233, Adobe AIR SDK before 20.0.0.233, andAdobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 20.0.0.233 allows attackers to executearbitrary code via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2015-8634, CVE-2015-8635, CVE-2015-8638, CVE-2015-8639, CVE-2015-8640,CVE-2015-8641, CVE-2015-8642, CVE-2015-8643, CVE-2015-8647, CVE-2015-8648,CVE-2015-8649, and CVE-2015-8650.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8646` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.559ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.559ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.559ubuntu0.14.04.1').
